## Description {#details}

Represents a cast operation.

It models the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/castinst">llvm::CastInst</a> concept. The exception is bitcast.

Definition at line 856 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/genericmachineinstrs-h">GenericMachineInstrs.h</a>.
